name: Better-Than-Cream-Soda Rhubarb Cocktail
description: This rhubarb and vanilla-laced cocktail gets an unexpected twist from pisco and rich Scottish ale.
recipeYield: Makes 1 cocktail, plus enough syrup for 12-13 cocktails
recipeIngredient: 1 Mexican vanilla bean, cut lengthwise and seeds scraped (reserve pod)
3 ounces Scottish ale, such as Ballast Point Piper Down

recipeInstructions.text: For the Rhubarb-Vanilla Syrup: Combine sugar, rhubarb, water, and vanilla seeds and pod in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil and then lower to a simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand for 30 minutes. Strain into an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use, up to 2 weeks.

For the Cocktail: In a rocks glass filled with ice, build the drink by adding pisco and rhubarb vanilla syrup. Gently add beer, stirring just to combine. Garnish with vanilla bean and serve immediately.
